analysis.description:
Ownable.newOwner (/unique_chucks/34/0xfac69c6c58276ee31d19061afc361bb3b774440f.sol#82) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- acceptOwnership (/unique_chucks/34/0xfac69c6c58276ee31d19061afc361bb3b774440f.sol#108-115)

LITECORE.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/34/0xfac69c6c58276ee31d19061afc361bb3b774440f.sol#201-202) shadows:
	- LITECOREToken.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/34/0xfac69c6c58276ee31d19061afc361bb3b774440f.sol#11-13)

LITECORE.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/34/0xfac69c6c58276ee31d19061afc361bb3b774440f.sol#201-202)
LITECOREToken.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/34/0xfac69c6c58276ee31d19061afc361bb3b774440f.sol#11-13)
Ownable.newOwner should be constant (/unique_chucks/34/0xfac69c6c58276ee31d19061afc361bb3b774440f.sol#82)
